title: Band (Peru), 100 BC–1 AD
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: embroidered in stem stitch on plain weave foundation
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 359.5 x 2.7 cm (11 ft. 9 9/16 in. x 1 1/16 in.)
description: Long band of dark green wool embroidered in stem stitch in many bright colors in a running pattern of exotic birds with fruit or vegetables in their beaks.
